item.title: Ready to use EDM on R
item.description: I wrote MEMO that the preparation for running rEDM using EC2. EDM: Emprical Dynamic Modeling rEDM: R packages using EDM EC2(Official name: Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud): one of the AWS platforms. The above MEMO focuses on after establishing an instance on EC2.
